title: ESS的权限warp
author: Mao_Rong
txt_content: 如题 怎么让权限组 Builder 不可以去/warp m4的地方？？？？

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
打开ess
打开config
找到per-warp-permission
设置为true
然后输入/mangaddp builder essentials.warps.*
再输入
/mangaddp builder -essentials.warps.m4
即可

replies.author: Mao_Rong
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2016-11-13 19:45
打开ess
打开config
找到per-warp-permission
那是不是 给权限就是 /mangaddp builder essentials.warps.m4 ???

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
Mao_Rong 发表于 2016-11-14 18:54
我试试哈
给权限要一个加号
/mangaddp builder +essentials.warps.m4
